Getting Started

Introduction

Ideal Utilities is a library of functional CSS classes.

Configuration

The library leverages CSS Variables to set things like colors, font weights, and custom media queries. Include your own declarations to override the CSS variables.

Media Queries

postcss-custom-media

Custom media queries are set to make media queries more semantic and easier to work with.

You may override the default values by defining your own custom media query declarations.

Available Values: [ xs | sm | md | lg | xl | xxl ]

Each value corresponds to a CSS Variable defined in settings.

@custom-media --mq-xs (min-width: 20em);
@custom-media --mq-sm (min-width: 30em);
@custom-media --mq-md (min-width: 35.5em);
@custom-media --mq-lg (min-width: 48em);
@custom-media --mq-xl (min-width: 64em);
@custom-media --mq-xxl (min-width: 80em);

Abbreviation: mq

Format: --mq-<value>

## General Usage
@media (--mq-xs) {}
@media (--mq-sm) {}
@media (--mq-md) {}
@media (--mq-lg) {}
@media (--mq-xl) {}
@media (--mq-xxl) {}

Flexbox

Align Content

MDN

Available Values: [ flex-start | flex-end | center | space-between | space-around | space-evenly | stretch ]

Abbreviation: ac

Format: u-ac--<value>

<p class="u-ac--flex-start"></p>
<p class="u-ac--flex-end"></p>
<p class="u-ac--center"></p>
<p class="u-ac--space-between"></p>
<p class="u-ac--space-around"></p>
<p class="u-ac--space-evenly"></p>
<p class="u-ac--stretch"></p>

u-ac--flex-start

u-ac--flex-end

u-ac--center

u-ac--space-between

u-ac--space-around

u-ac--space-evenly

u-ac--stretch

Align Items

MDN

Available Values: [ flex-start | flex-end | center | baseline | stretch ]

Abbreviation: ai

Format: u-ai--<value>

<p class="u-ai--flex-start"></p>
<p class="u-ai--flex-end"></p>
<p class="u-ai--center"></p>
<p class="u-ai--baseline"></p>
<p class="u-ai--stretch"></p>

u-ai--flex-start

u-ai--flex-end

u-ai--center

u-ai--baseline

u-ai--stretch

Align Self

MDN

Available Values: [ auto | flex-start | flex-end | center | baseline | stretch ]

Abbreviation: as

Format: u-as--<value>

<p class="u-as--flex-start"></p>
<p class="u-as--flex-end"></p>
<p class="u-as--center"></p>
<p class="u-as--stretch"></p>
<p class="u-as--auto"></p>

Flex Direction

MDN

Available Values: [ row | row-reverse | column | column-reverse ]

Unavailable Values: [ inherit | initial | unset ]

Abbreviation: flex

Format: u-flex--<value>

<p class="u-flex--row"></p>
<p class="u-flex--row-reverse"></p>
<p class="u-flex--column"></p>
<p class="u-flex--column-reverse"></p>

u-flex--row

u-flex--row-reverse

u-flex--column

u-flex--column-reverse

Flex Wrap

MDN

Available Values: [ nowrap | wrap | wrap-reverse ]

Unavailable Values: [ inherit | initial | unset ]

Abbreviation: flex

Format: u-flex--<value>

<p class="u-flex--wrap"></p>
<p class="u-flex--wrap-reverse"></p>
<p class="u-flex--nowrap"></p>

u-flex--wrap-reverse

u-flex--nowrap

Colors

Background Color

MDN

Available Values: [ white | white-off | gray-light | gray | gray-dark | theme-primary | theme-secondary | theme-tertiary ]

Each value corresponds to a color in the $colors Sass map.

$colors: (
  white: #fff,
  white-off: gray(95%),
  gray-light: gray(80%),
  gray: gray(40%),
  gray-dark: gray(20%),
  theme-primary: #3494e6,
  theme-secondary: #36d7b7,
  theme-tertiary: #86d5c7
);

Abbreviation: bgc

Format: u-bgc--<value>

<p class="u-bgc--white"></p>
<p class="u-bgc--white-off"></p>
<p class="u-bgc--gray-light"></p>
<p class="u-bgc--gray"></p>
<p class="u-bgc--gray-dark"></p>
<p class="u-bgc--theme-primary"></p>
<p class="u-bgc--theme-secondary"></p>
<p class="u-bgc--theme-tertiary"></p>

u-bgc--white

u-bgc--white-off

u-bgc--gray-light

u-bgc--gray

u-bgc--gray-dark

u-bgc--theme-primary

u-bgc--theme-secondary

u-bgc--theme-tertiary

Color

MDN

Available Values: [ white | white-off | gray-light | gray | gray-dark | theme-primary | theme-secondary | theme-tertiary ]

Each value corresponds to a color in the $colors Sass map.

$colors: (
  white: #fff,
  white-off: gray(95%),
  gray-light: gray(80%),
  gray: gray(40%),
  gray-dark: gray(20%),
  theme-primary: #3494e6,
  theme-secondary: #36d7b7,
  theme-tertiary: #86d5c7
);

Abbreviation: color

Format: u-color--<value>

<p class="u-color--white"></p>
<p class="u-color--white-off"></p>
<p class="u-color--gray-light"></p>
<p class="u-color--gray"></p>
<p class="u-color--gray-dark"></p>
<p class="u-color--theme-primary"></p>
<p class="u-color--theme-secondary"></p>

Borders

Border Radius

MDN

Available Values: [ 0 | 1 | 2 | 3 | 4 | 25p | 50p ]

All values correspond to a pixel value except for 25p and 50p which refer to a percentage value.

Abbreviation: border-radius

Format: u-border-radius--<value>

<p class="u-border-radius--0"></p>
<p class="u-border-radius--1"></p>
<p class="u-border-radius--2"></p>
<p class="u-border-radius--3"></p>
<p class="u-border-radius--4"></p>
<p class="u-border-radius--25p"></p>
<p class="u-border-radius--50p"></p>

u-border-radius--0

u-border-radius--1

u-border-radius--2

u-border-radius--3

u-border-radius--4

u-border-radius--25p

u-border-radius--50p

Border

MDN

Available Values: [ all | x | y | top | right | bottom | left | none ]

Abbreviation: border

Format: u-border--<value>

<p class="u-border--all"></p>
<p class="u-border--x"></p>
<p class="u-border--y"></p>
<p class="u-border--top"></p>
<p class="u-border--right"></p>
<p class="u-border--bottom"></p>
<p class="u-border--left"></p>
<p class="u-border--none"></p>

u-border--all

u-border--x

u-border--y

u-border--top

u-border--right

u-border--bottom

u-border--left

u-border--none

Layout

Center Block

Helper class for horizontally centering an element.

Format: u-center-block

<div class="u-center-block"></div>
u-center-block

MDN

Available Values: [ left | right | none ]

Abbreviation: float

Format: u-float--<value>

<p class="u-float--left"></p>
<p class="u-float--right"></p>
<p class="u-float--none"></p>

u-float--left

u-float--right

u-float--none

List

Controls the appearance of a list element (e.g. ul, ol, dl)

Available Values: [ unstyled | inline ]

Abbreviation: list

Format: u-list--<value>

<ul class="u-list--unstyled">
  <li></li>
</ul>
  • .u-list--unstyled
  • .u-list--unstyled
<ul class="u-list--inline">
  <li></li>
</ul>
  • .u-list--inline
  • .u-list--inline
  • .u-list--inline

MDN

Available Values: [ 0 | 5 | 10 | 20 | 30 | 40 ]

Abbreviation: [ ma | mx | my | mt | mr | mb | ml ]

<p class="u-ma--0"></p>
<p class="u-mx--0"></p>
<p class="u-my--0"></p>
<p class="u-mt--0"></p>
<p class="u-mr--0"></p>
<p class="u-mb--0"></p>
<p class="u-ml--0"></p>

No visuals currently available

MDN

Available Values: [ baseline | sub | super | text-top | text-bottom | middle | top | bottom ]

Display

MDN

Available Values: [ none | inline | block | inline-block | table | table-cell | flex ]

Unavailable Values: [ list-item | inline-list-item | inline-table | table-column | table-column-group | table-footer-group | table-header-group | table-row | table-row-group | inline-flex | grid | inline-grid | run-in | ruby | ruby-base | ruby-text | ruby-base-container | ruby-text-container | contents ]

Abbreviation: display

Format: u-display--<value>

<p class="u-display--block"></p>
<p class="u-display--inline-block"></p>
<p class="u-display--inline"></p>
<p class="u-display--flex"></p>
<p class="u-display--table"></p>
<p class="u-display--table-cell"></p>
<p class="u-display--none"></p>

u-display--block

u-display--inline-block

u-display--inline

u-display--flex

u-display--table

u-display--table-cell

u-display--none

Opacity

MDN

Available Values: [ 0 | 01 | 02 | 03 | 04 | 05 | 06 | 07 | 08 | 09 | 1 ]

Each value corresponds to a number between 0.0 and 1.0 at increments of 0.1. (e.g. u-op--05 corresponds to opacity: 0.5;)

Abbreviation: op

Format: u-op--<value>

<p class="u-op--0"></p>
<p class="u-op--01"></p>
<p class="u-op--02"></p>
<p class="u-op--03"></p>
<p class="u-op--04"></p>
<p class="u-op--05"></p>
<p class="u-op--06"></p>
<p class="u-op--07"></p>
<p class="u-op--08"></p>
<p class="u-op--09"></p>
<p class="u-op--1"></p>

u-op--0

u-op--01

u-op--02

u-op--03

u-op--04

u-op--05

u-op--06

u-op--07

u-op--08

u-op--09

u-op--1

<p class="u-fs--05"></p>
<p class="u-fs--075"></p>

<p class="u-fs--3"></p>

MDN

<p class="u-ta--left"></p>
<p class="u-ta--right"></p>
<p class="u-ta--center"></p>
<p class="u-ta--justify"></p>

Letter Spacing

MDN

Available Values: [ compact | normal | loose ]

Each value corresponds to a CSS Variable defined in settings.

:root {
  --letter-compact: -1px;
  --letter-normal: 0;
  --letter-loose: 2px;
}

Abbreviation: ls

Format: u-ls--<value>

<p class="u-ls--compact"></p>
<p class="u-ls--normal"></p>
<p class="u-ls--loose"></p>

u-ls--compact

u-ls--normal

u-ls--loose

Line Height

MDN

Available Values: [ normal | 1 ]

Abbreviation: lh

Format: u-lh--<value>

<p class="u-lh--normal"></p>
<p class="u-lh--1"></p>

u-lh--normal

u-lh--1

Font Family

MDN

Available Values: [ system ]

Each value corresponds to a CSS Variable defined in settings.

:root {
  --font-stack-system: -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, "Segoe UI", Roboto, Oxygen, Ubuntu, Cantarell, "Open Sans", "Helvetica Neue", sans-serif;
}

Abbreviation: ff

Format: u-ff--<value>

<p class="u-ff--system"></p>

u-ff--system

Text Decoration

MDN

Available Values: [ underline | overline | line-through | blink | none ]

Unavailable Values: [ inherit | initial ]

Abbreviation: td

Format: u-td--<value>

<p class="u-td--underline"></p>
<p class="u-td--overline"></p>
<p class="u-td--line-through"></p>
<p class="u-td--blink"></p>
<p class="u-td--none"></p>

Text with underline

Text with overline

Text with line-through

Text with blink

Text with none

Text Hide

Hides text

<p class="u-text-hide"></p>

u-text-hide

Text Transform

MDN

Available Values: [ capitalize | lowercase | uppercase ]

Unavailable Values: [ none | full-width | inherit | initial | unset ]

Abbreviation: tt

Format: u-tt--<value>

<p class="u-tt--capitalize"></p>
<p class="u-tt--lowercase"></p>
<p class="u-tt--uppercase"></p>

Capitalize is a keyword forcing the first letter of each word to be converted to uppercase. Other characters are unchanged.

Lowercase is a keyword forcing all characters to be converted to lowercase.

Uppercase is a keyword forcing all characters to be converted to uppercase.

Truncate

CSS-Tricks

Prevents text from wrapping and shows an ellipsis instead.

Format: u-truncate

<p class="u-truncate"></p>

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit. Autem fugit quia soluta quidem, quasi pariatur veniam. Aperiam amet fugit nemo laboriosam eos maiores delectus quia id, consequuntur, ea dolores voluptates.

White Space

MDN

Available Values: [ normal | nowrap | pre | pre-wrap | pre-line | inherit | initial | unset ]

Abbreviation: ws

Format: u-ws--<value>

<p class="u-ws--normal"></p>
<p class="u-ws--nowrap"></p>
<p class="u-ws--pre"></p>
<p class="u-ws--pre-wrap"></p>
<p class="u-ws--pre-line"></p>
<p class="u-ws--inherit"></p>
<p class="u-ws--initial"></p>
<p class="u-ws--unset"></p>

Miscellaneous

Invisible

MDN

Available Values: [ visible | hidden | collapse ]

Unavailable Values: [ inherit | initial | unset ]

Abbreviation: vis

Format: u-vis--<value>

u-vis--visible

u-vis--hidden

u-vis--collapse

<p class="u-vis--visible"></p>
<p class="u-vis--hidden"></p>
<p class="u-vis--collapse"></p>

Screen Reader

Bootstrap v4 Screenreaders

Hide an element to all devices except screen readers. Combine with .u-sr-only--focusable to show the element again when it’s focused (e.g. by a keyboard-only user).

<p class="u-sr-only"></p>
<p class="u-sr-only u-sr-only--focusable"></p>

u-sr-only

u-sr-only u-sr-only--focusable
